Init.description: Initializes the number converter instance with the set options.

params.name: options
params.description:
an object literal used to provide an optional information to 
initialize the converter.

format.description:
Formats a Number and returns the formatted string, using the options this converter was 
initialized with.

getHint.description: Retrieves a hint String describing the format the value is expected to be in.

getOptions.description: Returns the options called with converter initialization.

parse.description: Parses a string value to return a Number, using the options this converter was initialized with.

resolvedOptions.description:
Returns an object literal with properties reflecting the number formatting options computed based 
on the options parameter. If options (or pattern) is not provided, the properties will be derived 
from the locale defaults.
